attributes.action: Put pressure on Islamic Nations to accept more immigrants from failed nations.
attributes.background: You have seen the painful death of a young boy on European beaches. Why are immigrants rushing into Europe and why are they not going to other Islamic nations. There are so many rich nations that can easily accommodate. UK and other EU must put pressure on Islamic nations to accommodate this.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107184

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
